lead_paragraph: WINICK--Allan L. We regretfully record the passing of our beloved uncle, the Honorable Allan L. Winick. A devoted son, brother, brother-in-law, uncle, great-uncle, great-great-uncle, friend and colleague. He served as a judge with distinction in New York State for 23 years. He is survived by niece, Lauren Rapoport, and nephew and niece Steven and Georgene Winick along with 8 great- nieces and nephews and 9 great-great-nieces and nephews. He will be missed by all who knew him. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WINICK, ALLAN L
